url_phishing_indicators.reasoning: URL contains IP address and typosquatting patterns
evidence: URL: http://192.168.1.1/login - Uses IP address instead of domain

url_legitimate.reasoning: All URLs are from legitimate domains with no suspicious patterns

content_phishing_urgency.reasoning: Email contains urgency tactics and requests for sensitive information

content_legitimate.reasoning: Professional tone, no urgency, personalized greeting

header_spf_fail.reasoning: Email failed SPF validation and has From/Reply-To mismatch

header_legitimate.reasoning: Email passes all authentication checks (SPF, DKIM, DMARC)

financial_wire_fraud.reasoning: High-risk wire transfer urgency with domain impersonation
evidence: Wire transfer urgency: 'immediate wire transfer required'
Account compromise claim: 'your account is compromised'

financial_legitimate.reasoning: Sender domain is legitimate bank with no fraud patterns

visual_phishing.reasoning: HTML contains password fields and suspicious external resources
evidence: Contains password input field - HIGH RISK
Form submits to external URL: http://fake-bank.com/login.php

visual_legitimate.reasoning: No obvious visual phishing indicators in HTML structure
